ygData.subject: SV: [EverQuest] Re: **Help Needed!**
ygData.msgSnippet: No, Everquest is a dynamic game and will be updated almost once every week. Since you bought EQ some time ago alot of updates has happend, just stay calm and
ygData.messageBody:
No, Everquest is a dynamic game and will be updated almost once every week.
Since you bought EQ some time ago alot of updates has happend, just stay
calm and let the download finnish =)

-domi
